page.title: 11Shops in Ombersley
page.content: For a small village we have many shops.These include:"The Garage" which sells petrol and oil and maintains cars;"The Galleries";"Evertons" a food and drink shop which sells mainly cheese.Some Evertons'{prices}are:Red Cheshire cheese 43p/lb and English Blue Stilton Â£2/lb.At the back of the shop is a cash and carry which sells mainly food.There is a newsagents called"Gally's",a bakers called "P.R.France" where bread is baked on the premises.There is a unisex hair salon,"T.H.Checketts" the butchers, "The Antique Shop" and at the far end of the village the" V.G.General Stores" and "Brandons" a hardware store.Christmas and summer were the {busiest times}of the year for most of the shops.In the summer lots of {tourists}come to Ombersley.Most shops close on Sundays and Mondays.
